channel.title: Rename the Inquisitor's "Holy Blessing" to "Fanatical Devotion"
channel.description:
He already has "Ruthless Efficiency", and "Fanatical Devotion" is a cooler name anyway, even aside from continuing the references.
(I mean I guess you could say that he's protected from death by his nice red uniform, but fanatical devotion makes more sense.)

item.title: Rename the Inquisitor's "Holy Blessing" to "Fanatical Devotion"
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
/support
That’d make him sound like some MEGA weeaboo.

Read full topic
